description: We are seeking a seasoned mobile developer to maintain and expand our core application. Expertise in **Kotlin** and native **Java** development for Android is a must. Candidates must be proficient in working with the **Android SDK** and integrating third-party services via **REST API**. Experience with local data persistence using **SQL** and deep skills in debugging are strongly preferred.

Join our product team focusing on user interfaces. Strong foundational skills in **HTML**, **CSS**, and **JavaScript** are essential. We heavily utilize modern frameworks like **React** and **Vue**. All developers are expected to maintain our code base using **Git** and ensure **Responsive Design** across all platforms.

The QA team is hiring an engineer to establish and execute testing strategies. Experience with automated testing tools like **Selenium** and **Appium** is required. Must be familiar with unit testing frameworks such as **JUnit** and possess strong **Manual Testing** skills. Daily tasks involve detailed **Bug Tracking** and developing new **Automation Testing** scripts.
